column2: Using coal, the synthetic oil factory produces oil out of that coal. Vital for nations that do not have ready access to oil.
column3: L'usine d'huile de synthèse produit de l'huile à partir de charbon. Cette huile de synthèse est vitale pour les nations qui n'ont pas accès au pétrole.
column4: Die Syntheseölfabrik produziert Öl aus Kohle. Unerlässlich für Nationen, die keinen Zugang zu Ölvorkommen haben.
column6: La fábrica de petróleo sintético utiliza carbón para producir este recurso. Es vital para aquellos países que no tienen acceso al petróleo.

column2: Using oil, the synthetic rubber factory produces rubber out of that oil. Vital for nations that do not have ready access to rubber.
Using oil and lumber, the synthetic tropical factory produces tropical wood. Vital for nations that do not have ready access to tropical wood.
Using oil and cotton, the synthetic rubber factory produces silk. Vital for nations that do not have ready access to silk.
